alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 4:10PM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Snow diminishing late tonight and early Saturday morning. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Expect very difficult travel conditions, with areas of blowing and drifting snow reducing visibility at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip. org

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
